name: KINSWOOD
description:
(UPDATE: Fixed the timer starting in the title screen.)

A game for Suny Poly's first game jam of the semester.

Theme: Family

You are trying to prepare for a family gathering. You have to gather items; but avoid the falling sticks and make sure the time doesnt run out or else you will lose!

Goal: Store 50 items before the time runs out!

CONTROLS:

[W or Up arrow] to navigate up and to store items in your home.

[S or Down arrow]to navigate down

[Space ] to jump and confirm

[A/D or Right/Left arrows] to move
